levels.title: Non-Profit
levels.benefits: Benefits include attendance at our monthly networking event, digital marketing training, and advertising for the first week on our front page.

levels.title: Bronze
levels.benefits: Benefits include a 20% discount at every networking event, quarterly digital marketing training, and quarterly business administration training.

levels.title: Silver
levels.benefits: Benefits include a 35% discount at every networking event, digital marketing and business administration training every two months, and a 50% discount on advertising on our front page.

levels.title: Gold
levels.benefits: Benefits include a 50% discount at every networking event, monthly digital marketing and business administration training, free advertising on our front page, and 20% discount to our local CPAs.
